article_metadata.title_en: Video: A Bride in Gaza Loses Her Groom the Day Before the Wedding, Duration 1:57
article_metadata.text_summary_en: The article reports on the tragic story of a Palestinian woman, Malak Abu Al-Amreen, who lost her fiancé, Ahmed Ghrab, the day before their wedding. Ahmed and his entire family were killed in an Israeli airstrike on Deir al-Balah in the central Gaza Strip. Prior to the strike, the Israeli army had issued warnings to residents of five neighborhoods in the Deir al-Balah area, urging them to evacuate to shelters. The article highlights the devastating impact of the conflict on civilians in Gaza.
